name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open haiku reader”
”Alexa, tell haiku reader”
”Alexa, ask haiku reader”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: Haiku Reader is an Alexa skill set where Alexa recites a random haiku to the user. A haiku is a three-line poem which originates from the Japanese, written in a five, seven and five syllable count. The poem is a way of expression and can emphasize imagery and simplicity. Users will be able to ask Alexa for a haiku or poem from haiku reader.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
